Vigil held for BU students killed in New Zealand crash

Nearly 200 students gathered for a candlelight vigil at a chapel on Boston University’s campus Saturday night to mourn the deaths of three of their classmates who were killed in a van crash in New Zealand. (Boston Globe)

Celtics 92, Sixers 91

Celtics beat Sixers late in Game 1

Rajon Rondo registered another post-season triple double to lead the Celtics over Philadelphia in a close contest that saw Boston stage a late game comeback. (Globe)
